resources.string: Sir,\nWith due respect I am to state that I need

Sir,
With due respect, I would like to resign from my job. Thank you very much for the opportuinities for professional and personal development. I would like to request you to grant my resign letter.

Effective Date:

with the recommendation of my superior, I
would like to request you to grant my leave and oblige thereby.
Reason for leave:
